}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "EPMBCXR905BCN2ET" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. :This is an '''Amigo''' / '''E-TOP''' device.
The FCC test report notes the models covered as the... *'''E-TOP''' BR760n (no USB), DR768n (USB) *'''Amigo''' BR760n (no USB), DR768n (USB) *'''CNet''' (w/out USB) CWR-905, WR-905, WR-100N, WR-95N, WR-900N, BR-100N, BR-95N, BR-900N *'''CNet''' (w/ USB) CDR-905, DR-905, DR-100N, DR-95N, DR-900N *'''SAPIDO''' (w/out USB) RB1402 *'''SAPIDO''' (w/ USB) WE1412, WE1422, GR1412, GR1422
Default settings (including the SSID..) are per the FCC manual. They could be completely wrong...
The power supplies noted in the test report are... *'''Amigo''' AMS2-0501500FU (100-240VAC ~ 50/60Hz, 0.5A -> 5VDC, 1.5A) *'''LB''' M2-I2USG05R-A (100-240VAC ~ 50/60Hz, 0.5A -> 5VDC, 2.5A)
[[Category:English Documentation]]
